PAUSE_CUSTOMIZER.ANIMATION_DIRECTION_HINT: Choose the direction of the rotation animation. Select "Default" to use the system standard (newer versions of the DnD5e system no longer use rotation). Select "none" to disable rotation.
PAUSE_CUSTOMIZER.ANIMATION_DURATION_HINT: Choose the duration of the rotation animation. Leave the field empty to use the default value.
PAUSE_CUSTOMIZER.ANIMATION_TIMING_HINT: Choose the animation timing of the rotation animation. Leave the field empty to use the default value.
PAUSE_CUSTOMIZER.OPACITY_HINT: Set the opacity value of the image (between 0 and 1).
PAUSE_CUSTOMIZER.PAUSE_BACKGROUND_HINT: Change the background image of the pause block. Select an image using the file picker. Leave the field empty to use the default text. The background image is only used if the rotation animation is enabled.
PAUSE_CUSTOMIZER.PAUSE_TEXT_HINT: Change the pause text. Leave the field empty to use the default text.
PAUSE_CUSTOMIZER.PAUSE_TEXT_COLOR_HINT: Change the color of the pause text.
PAUSE_CUSTOMIZER.PAUSE_TEXT_FONT_FAMILY_HINT: Font family of the pause text.
PAUSE_CUSTOMIZER.PAUSE_TEXT_FONT_SIZE_HINT: Change the font size of the pause text. Leave the field empty to use the default value.
PAUSE_CUSTOMIZER.PAUSE_TEXT_SHADOW_HINT: Change the shadow of the pause text. Leave the field empty to use the default value.
PAUSE_CUSTOMIZER.SELECT_IMAGE_HINT: Select an image as the pause icon. Leave the field empty to use the default value.
